thread.title: 18th Annual Exeter PTO Get Fit In May 5k and Kids Fun Run
thread.title_full: 18th Annual Exeter PTO Get Fit In May 5k and Kids Fun Run

title: 18th Annual Exeter PTO Get Fit In May 5k and Kids Fun Run
text: Co-ed   Get Fit in May 5K Race is USATF certified and features a fast, figure eight course through historic Exeter, New Hampshire. Come join the fun! Music, mascots, face-painting and plenty of refreshments at Lincoln Street School before and after the races. Proceeds benefit the Exeter Main Street and Lincoln Street Elementary Schools. Location
